user.getInfoWithEmail: SELECT id, email, password, access_key, name, update_at FROM user WHERE email = ? AND password = ?
user.getInfoWithKey: SELECT id, email, password, access_key, name, update_at FROM user WHERE access_key = ?
user.getAccessKey: SELECT id, access_key FROM user WHERE email = ? AND password = ?
user.insert: INSERT INTO user (email, password, access_key, name) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
